Key Match Events: India suffered a 0-3 loss to Syria in their second and final Intercontinental Cup 2024 match
Syria scored the first goal in the 7th minute
India had many chances in the second half but conceded two late goals
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Manolo Marquez suffered his first loss as India coach
India finished last in the tournament, behind Mauritius on goal difference
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Gachibowli Athletic Stadium, Hyderabad
Others: India vs Syria, Intercontinental Cup 2024 Highlights: India trail 0-1 against Syria in the second half
